testcase.classname: Validate the product results as per ASIN values
testcase.name: Validate the Product result as per the ASIN value
testcase.system-out: Given User in "https://www.amazon.in/ref=nav_logo" homepage and search "ASIN B0BRSL2XWP" in search box.passed When check the search results for given input in search box.................passed And user can select first product from the showed results...................passed And validate the title of the page after landing the product page...........passed And validate the product page was same what user selected in result page....passed And validate the given ASIN "B0BRSL2XWP" value is presented in the product page and verify the search asin and showed result value is same.passed
